channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Cone and scooter dumped in the river, 20th January
item.description:
There’s a traffic cone and a child’s scooter been dumped in the river by Main Rd near the flint bridge on the bend whjch needs clearing please . It’s been reported before on FMS but both items still in the river .

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Brook Way, St Paul's Cray, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Bridge collapsing off Cold Blow meadow, 20th January
item.description:
The planks on this bridge have been falling away for the last year, and have now become VERY dangerous to the point where a child could fall completely through, or an adult could suffer a serious injury. This footpath is used regularly by walkers, joggers and even cyclists.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Portman Close, Joydens Wood, Dartford
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Shopping Trolley near the river by the fallen tree, 20th January
item.description:
There’s a shopping trolley which was on the river and reported on FMS that is now on the pathway by the river near the fallen tree. Please could this trolley be taken away this time before it ends up somewhere else in the park,

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 11, Riverside Close, St Paul's Cray, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Near to 100 Godstow Road: white doors, etc., 20th January
item.description:
Fly-tipping is propped up against railings round grass verge. The railings are in Eynsham Drive, but nearest address is as above.
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Godstow Road, Abbey Wood
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Leafs and mud along public footpath between Shepperton Rd & Broadcroft Rd., 20th January
item.description:
This public footpath has not been cleaned since January 2025 and is a main route for commuters and school children from Shepperton Rd and Broadcroft Rd, behind Crofton school, and in need of attention.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Derwent Drive, Poverest, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Frequently a lot of rubbish here, 20th January
item.description:
This path is in between Howitt Close off Allen Rd, Spencer Grove on the estate, Butterfield Green and the SWAPA play area and potentially falls between the remit of any of these for litter clearance. It is very frequently messy with a selection of litter

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Shakspeare Walk, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Outside no.14 Alba gardens. Sinkhole, broken wobbly pavement slabs., 20th January
item.description:
There’s a large hole under the pavement. This has caused the things above to slip and crack. There’s a large exposed hole where someone’s foot could easily fit and get stuck or trip.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 15, Alba Gardens, Temple Fortune, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet
